headline: Ask HN: Google Docs review since migrating to Canvas?
description:
A year ago, Google announced they would be migrating Google Docs over to Canvas.

https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html

Has anyone noticed this change?

As the change been better, worse, neutral (and why)?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 迁移到Canvas后的Google Docs审查？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 遷移到Canvas後的Google Docs審查？
description_zh-Hans:
一年前，谷歌宣布他们将把谷歌文档迁移到Canvas上。

https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html

有人注意到这一变化吗？

这一变化是更好、更坏还是中性（以及为什么）？
description_zh-Hant:
一年前，谷歌宣佈他們將把谷歌文檔遷移到Canvas上。

https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/05/Google-Docs-Canvas-Based-Rendering-Update.html

有人注意到這一變化嗎？

這一變化是更好、更壞還是中性（以及為什麼）？
